value.name: Her son died in 2006. After George Floyd’s death, Coast mom protests for the 1st time.
value.description: When her son died in police custody at the Harrison County jail in 2006, there were no protests or social media hashtags. After mourning for 15 years, she heard about a rally at Jones Park. That trip changed everything.
